transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello. Hello Good morning.
Halo.
Hi Gunjan good morning.
Executive: Good morning ma'am. Haanji.
Customer: Hi kaise ho aap?
Executive: Main theek hoon aap kaise hain?
Customer: Haan main bhi achcha hoon. Actually na maine kuch uh.
Executive: Haan boliye aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai mujhe.
Customer: Abhi meri aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji bataiyega.
Customer: Okay so Gunjan actually na maine matlab jo hamare products hain aapne dekhe honge ki hamare abhi to jo recently jo product dale hue hain matlab 29 products hain. But uh rest 64 products jo ki matlab hum pehle camera wale jo CCTV cameras wale.
Executive: You are not properly audible to me. Aapki aawaz kuch clear nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Just one minute.
Abhi meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? Ek minute. Nahi ma'am abhi bhi na cut cut ke aa rahi hai.
Executive: Clear nahi hai.
Customer: Abhi aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan so Gunjan main keh rahi thi ki hamare jo abhi 29 products hain theek hai. Rest jo hamare 64 products hain jo out of stock aapne mark kiye hue hain CCTV cameras wale. To usme hum abhi deal nahi kar rahe hain kya?
Executive: Nahi ma'am. Actually hum logon ne jo mere paas jo abhi aap dekhenge agar aap relevant leads par agar aap dekhenge to mujhe 18 hours ago ki lead dikha raha hai.
21 21 hours ago ki aur fir uske baad seedha kal ki leads dikha raha hai. Abhi recent koi lead mujhe nahi show ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan abhi abhi recently nahi hai abhi ke liye maine open kiya hua hai. Aur mujhe past leads mein jaise hi open karti hoon to three minutes ago interactive panel ki lead aa rakhi hai. Hai na door frame metal detector ki lead aa rakhi hai they are boom barrier ki lead aa rakhi hai Mohali Punjab se one aa rakhi hai. Ye sab mujhe past leads mein to show kar raha hai. But mera jo actual buylead hai usme mujhe kuch bhi show nahi ho raha hai.
Haan ma'am like maine bhi ye open kiya hua hai. Main pura uske keywords wagera change kar rahi thi. Abhi mujhe usme ek interactive flat panel ki bhi lead dikh rahi hai boom barrier ki bhi dikh rahi hai ek door frame metal ki bhi dikh rahi hai director haan past leads mein. To iske regarding main aapko ek cheez batana chahungi October ke last few days mein agar aap dekhenge to mere paas sabki query aa rahi thi matlab interactive panels ki bhi aa rahi thi bottle liquid machine ki bhi aa rahi thi. But jaise hi November start hua hai.
Uske baad all of sudden smart doors ki lead aani shuru hui and dheere dheere karke interactive panels ki lead bilkul band ho gayi hai aani. Aa hi nahi rahi hai agar aap dekhenge bhi to and iski doors metal detector door frame ki bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Ikki dukki ekdam se screen pe flash hota hai and matlab within a fraction of second agar aapne usko consume kar liya itna fast koi nahi hota hai na aap ekdam se thoda to aap read karenge na ki kis cheez ki query hai and jaise hi aap us person pe karenge to this lead expire one minute before how could it be possible ma'am?
Executive: Nahi nahi ma'am actually jaise ki sir ne Sunday sir ne mujhse kaha tha to maine team ko mail bhi kiya tha.
Customer: Nahi ma'am like maine mail bhi kiya apni technical team ko ki haan issue hai check karein jo hamari tech study team hoti hai but unhone revert kiya and sir ne bola tha mujhse ki mujhe loop par lena but actually I said officially mail mein loop karna allowed nahi hai but maine mail kiya aur unhone revert kiya ki there is no issue aur just told to your client that refresh again and check the buyleads. Ye refresh karke bhi check karegi aur sold out ho ja rahi hai. Aapke paas aisa kuch nahi kar sakte ki lead show honi shuru ho jaye main kuch aapke paas solution ho kya ki aap.
Executive: Haan wahi maine uh haan matlab maine bhi because technical team ne mujhse bola ki aisa issue hai ya fir aisa koi issue ho sakta hai. Unhone bola aisa koi issue nahi hai ye jo buyleads aa rahi hai wo instantly sold out ho ja rahi hai because uski demand zyada hai aur wo.
Customer: Ma'am meri screen pe to lead show hi nahi ho rahi hai na jo main usko consume karu. Haan agar main IndiaMART khol karke baithi hoon to mere paas at least ek to show ho pure din mein. Haan haan. Hai na and ye kaise possible hai ki mere paas buyleads ki screen pe show nahi ho raha hai past leads pe wo one minute ago ki lead mujhe show kar raha hai how could it be possible?
Executive: Yes ma'am like maine bhi discuss kiya wahi maine. Matlab mera perspective bhi samjhe kyunki I am here only to handle IndiaMART. And if there is no work on IndiaMART then what is the point of sitting here?
Customer: Yeah yeah yeah. I understand. Yes ma'am got it. Ma'am morning se evening tak agar main khali baithi hoon zero kuch aa raha hai meri taraf se to mera baithna bekar hai yahan pe.
Executive: Nahi ma'am I understand your concern. Haan matlab mera perspective thoda samajhne ki koshish kijiye na and please please solve this issue.
Customer: Nahi ma'am I understand your issue that's why maine matlab morning mein hi isko open kar liya isko account check kar rahi hoon khud se hi aur aapne dekha bhi hoga ki leads kab ki show kar raha hai hai na and un products ki leads mujhe show ho rahi hai jo hum log jin products mein hum log deal bhi nahi kar rahe hain. Dauwa ka 32 channel NVR ma'am aap samajh rahe ho agar koi Dauwa mangta hai to usne cameras bhi Dauwa ke hi lagaye honge. Tabhi wo Dauwa mang raha hai. Haan but uski aap wo dekhenge na category wo category hamare kisi product mein mapped hogi. Agar aisi koi lead aa rahi hai aapke paas ki wo us category ki nahi hai to usko aap not relevant mark kar dete hain to fir us category ki leads nahi aati hain. Then aap okay. Like koi lead aapko aisi aa rahi hai jaise ki ye hamare bilkul product ki nahi hai to ye nahi but wo alag models aa rahe hain I think category wo. Right ma'am hum NVR to karte hain dekhiye main ye nahi kehti ki hum NVR nahi kar rahe hain hum NVR ka karte hain ka karte hain hum honeywell ka karte hain ma'am hum Dauwa nahi karte hum ek vision nahi karte.
To uh jo aapki leads aa rahi hain uske just neeche wo likhi hoti hain categories wo dikh rahi hai bataiye kaun kya likh rahi hai aapko kya show ho rahi hai?
Digital video recorders NVR.
Haan so ye hamari dono category kisi na kisi product mein mapped hai right? But upar right wo main aapki baat samajh rahi hoon but client jo mention bhi kar raha hai CP plus usne mention kar rakha hai hai na NVR CP plus starting mein jo aap meeting dekhoge usme aa raha hai CP plus. Bosh aa raha hai Bosh ka mang raha hai koi hai na ab ye vision ka mang raha hai to ab ye NVR hum deal karte hain but we are not deal in these these uh brands.
Hmm hmm nahi. Respective brands mein hum log deal hi nahi karte hain. Nahi wo hum kar sakte hain apne end se ki humen haan matlab hum na aise kar sakte hain ki apni kisi particular category ki lead aana band kar dete hain not relevant mein jaake aap click karenge matlab koi lead hai side mein aapko option milta hai not relevant aap us pe click karenge fir aapko option dikhega ki aapko not relevant kyun mark karna hai. Suppose ye aa raha hai Bosh ka NVR aa raha hai. Haan hai na agar main isko not relevant karti hoon to isme sabse first option to aa raha hai I do not deal in NVR category. Haan. Hai na I do not deal in rotor ports ab aisa to nahi hai ki we are not dealing in category we are dealing in but we are not dealing. Not relevant mein nahi kar sakte hain. Haan isko not relevant hum nahi kar sakte hain kyunki hum to deal kar hi rahe hain. Haan kyunki fir to deal kar hi rahe hain. Haan wahi.
Bahut challenge aa raha hai ma'am IndiaMART mein I don't know why October tak sab achcha chal raha tha. Hmm. But jaise hi November start hua I am sorry to say mujhe IndiaMART completely useless lag raha hai ab. Uh I understand because wo kaam nahi hai to useless hi hogi na ma'am wo cheez. Nahi wo aapki baat theek hai but maybe ho sakta hai ki abhi ke liye yahan par matlab aise requirements wagera kam aa rahi hain but bas issue wahi hai ki wo leads humen usme show ho rahi hain. To aap inquiries wagera to aa rahi hongi na ma'am jo lead manager mein inquiries aati hain aapko direct. Ma'am lead manager mein ikki dukki koi inquiry aa rahi hai. Lead manager mein ikki dukki koi inquiry aa rahi hai aap dekh sakte honge khol karke aap check kar lijiye. Haan main ek minute. Accha jo kal maine hi teen char calls kare hain wo all of sudden matlab show jaise hi show hua maine us pe contact buyer kar liya without reading it ki kya hai. Mujhe baad mein. Nahi inquiries to ma'am theek aa rahi hain waise to aap check karenge abhi matlab seven days mein 32 inquiries aayi hain humen. Kahan pe ma'am buyleads mein? Yes nahi lead manager mein lead manager mein aap jayenge to wahan par aap message jo aapko aate hain wo inquiries mein count hote hain. Haan. Haan haan haan haan. Direct jo aapko message karte hain clients like aapko abhi jaise ki Dehradun se. Active package scanner hai ma'am isme fake calls bhi bahut hoti hain ma'am. Maine active package scanner isko call kara hai. Yes wo fraud bhi hai inquiries mein fake calls bhi hoti hain normal inquiry kar rahe hote hain wo. Haan isko call kara we are just gaining general knowledge. To is tarike ki bhi aapko show ho rahi hain but they are useless for us kyunki kuch iska output to aa nahi raha hai na. Hmm hmm nahi jaise ki aap Dehradun se bhi 14 November ko ye aayi thi ye bhi help ko chahiye 75 label per minute manually likha hua unhone order review. Uh ye likha hua inquiry for SG 600 labeler from Naresh. But point ye hai ma'am pure din mein ek ya do lead show ho rahi hai to worth hai kuch aap batao ye cheez. Nahi wo main do lead show ho rahi hain. Hai na aur jo main jo hain jinme hum log earn kar sakte hain uski lead show hi nahi ho rahi hai. Nahi wo bhi wo ek pattern ban jata hai na jaise main bol rahi thi ki aap us time se kisi ek product ki lead consume kar rahe hain to fir usi ke zyada aa rahi thi. Hmm. Kisi jaise bhi koi issue hota hai but humen manually humen search karke milni mil rahi hain wo ek issue aa raha hai. Haan ji. But main isko dekh rahi hoon apne end se khud se abhi main. Please solve karne ki koshish kijiye kyunki abhi bhi aap agar buyleads khologe to 22 hours ago 12 hours ago yesterday yahi leads mere paas is time show ho rahi hai sabse pehle mujhe lead show ho rahi hai one TB external hard disk 22 hours ago ki and uske baad mein yesterday ki lead aa rahi hain saari. Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Hai na 17 hours ago 17 hours ago. Hai na to dekhiye agar aap kuch kar sakte hain isme to please kijiye. Haan ma'am main kar rahi hoon isme aapko dekh rahi hoon main ab mujhe kuch hota hai to main aapko batati hoon. Wo just maine ek bar aap check kar lena koi matlab ki inquiries wagera bhi aap achche se dekhiye ek bar theek hai and then koi uske regarding koi mujhe lagta hai to main aapko call back karti hoon. Theek hai theek hai ma'am. Aur maine kuch changes kiye the that's why matlab main aapko call kar rahi thi ki maine. Aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai. Clear nahi aa rahi hai mujhe. Abhi theek hai? Haan hello. Abhi theek hai hello. Haan main keh rahi thi ki maine na kuch aapke products ke keywords wagera matlab thode change kiye the to ek bar aap check kar lena kisi ka wrong to nahi ho gaya hai theek hai? Achcha theek hai ma'am main dekh rahi hoon products wagera. Okay. Take care. Theek hai okay ma'am. Okay thank you have a good day. Bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not showing on buyleads screen.

- Past leads showing one minute ago.

- Leads of products not dealing are showing.

- Inquiries are very less in lead manager.



Resolution:

- Executive is checking the issue.

- Executive asked to check inquiries.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, leads, inquiries, products, category
